channel.title: Notes on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Thoughts

item.title: Working philosophy - page1
item.description: The following note is one of a series on philosophy. The thoughts are prepared by a family elder and presented in the manner they have been transmitted. Page One In the pure sense it’s (philosophy) concerned with: Our nature: what we are. Our understanding: how we know. Political theory and aesthetics are subsidiary offshoots. For the Greeks, the paradigm was Mind + Body + Soul. 1600 watershed moment: coincided with the explosion of scientific discoveries in the West (Royal Societies formed in France and UK).

item.title: Learning R - Rice
item.description: Conclusions Estimated farmer pretax in India of around US$84 per 20 foot container of shipped rough raw rice. That represents a 78% reduction in take home pretax profit since start of 2020 when estimated pretax stood at US$340/container. Despite some increase in price since the start of 2020 farming profitability has fallen sharply. Trigger to enquiry Article in Economic Times of India (accessed: 2020-05-12) that reported today that Basmati rice exporters are suffering from higher shipping costs as a result of lack of containers.

Cheung Kong meeting Structure of group Outlook for real estate market and comparison to press cycle Presales legislation and easing impact on business What is an ideal sandbank size given unattractive price outlook? How to interpret falling consents to commence work ? A reflection of developer confidence in outlook for market or some other reason? Net cash position ? i.e. acquisitions made over past year? Hang Lung meeting Capital expenditure projection Funding for sites recently acquired how?
